txt.en: 'I am very glad to have your assistance in this matter, [placeholder].\n\n'Part of our bait will require a strong metal that can be fashioned into hooks and cable.  Bring me ten Khazâd-steel ingots, and I'll add them to our collection.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! Your contribution is greatly appreciated.\n\n'Be sure to speak with me again if you have more ingredients to add to the pile.'
'Have you gathered the materials I requested, [placeholder]?'
Hasta is asking that anyone willing to help him should gather the various ingredients necessary to draw forth the menace from beneath the Water-works.
Khazâd-steel ingots can be crafted by Prospectors throughout Middle-earth.\n\nHasta would like you to bring him five Khazâd-steel ingots.
